name: Movies In Other Words Test | Movies Word Play

questions.correct: Singin' In The Rain & Singing In The Rain & Singin In The Rain
questions.explanation:
Singin' In The Rain & Singing In The Rain & Singin In The Rain.

	Starring Gene Kelly, Debbie Reynolds, Donald O'Connor, and Jean Hagen.

Gone With The Wind.

	Starring Clark Gable, Vivien Leigh, Leslie Howard, and Olivia De Havilland.

Little Women.

	Starring Winona Ryder, Susan Sarandon, Kirsten Dunst, and Christian Bale.

Ever After.

	Starring Drew Barrymore, Dougray Scott, Anjelica Huston, and Melanie Lynskey.

Sleepy Hollow.

	Starring Johnny Depp, Christina Ricci, and Martin Landau.

Pleasantville.

	Starring Reese Witherspoon, Tobey Maguire, Joan Allen, and William H. Macy

The Producers.

	Starring Gene Wilder and Zero Mostel.

Fiddler On The Roof.

	Starring Topol, Norma Crane, Leonard Frey, and Paul Michael Glaser.

Scary Movie.

	Starring Anna Faris, Shannon Elizabeth, Marlon Wayans, and Shawn Wayans.

Braveheart & Brave Heart.

	Starring Mel Gibson and Sophie Marceau.

Never Been Kissed.

	Starring Drew Barrymore, Michael Vartan, David Arquette, and Jessica Alba.

The Wedding Singer.

	Starring Adam Sandler, Drew Barrymore, Christine Taylor, and Matthew Glave.

Pretty In Pink.

	Starring Molly Ringwald, Andrew McCarthy, Jon Cryer, and Annie Potts.

questions.text: 12 O'Clock in the Yard of Nice and Mean (1997)
questions.correct: Midnight In The Garden Of Good And Evil
questions.explanation:
Midnight In The Garden Of Good And Evil.

	Starring John Cusack, Kevin Spacey, Jude Law, and Alison Eastwood.

Die Hard.

	Starring Bruce Willis, Bonnie Bedelia, Paul Gleason, and Reginald Vel Johnson.

Show Boat & Showboat.

	The 1951 version starred Howard Keel, Kathryn Grayson, Ava Gardner, and Joe. E. Brown.

Cruel Intentions.

	Starring Ryan Phillippe, Sarah Michelle Gellar, Reese Witherspoon, and Selma Blair.

High Fidelity.

	Starring John Cusack, Jack Black, Lisa Bonet, and Catherine Zeta-Jones.

Sliding Doors.

	Starring Gwyneth Paltrow, John Hannah, John Lynch, and Jeanne Tripplehorn

Circle Of Friends.

	Starring Minnie Driver, Chris O'Donnell, Saffron Burrows, and Alan Cumming

Fools Rush In.

	Starring Matthew Perry, Salma Hayek, and Jon Tenney.

Pretty Woman.

	Starring Julia Roberts, Richard Gere, Jason Alexander, and Laura San Giacomo.

Reality Bites.

	Starring Winona Ryder, Ethan Hawke, Ben Stiller, and Janeane Garofalo.

Memento.

	Starring Guy Pearce, Carrie-Anne Moss, and Joe Pantoliano.

Riding In Cars With Boys.

	Starring Drew Barrymore, James Woods, Steve Zahn, and Adam Garcia.
